dmca.title: Spam Received: Desi Girl Site - East Indian Hottie solo, group, toys..
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Joe A [mailto:joea@joesa.freeserve.co.uk] 
Posted At: Monday, July 03, 2006 7:00 AM
Posted To: Legal Response
Conversation: Spam Received: Desi Girl Site - East Indian Hottie solo,
group, toys.. 
Subject: Spam Received: Desi Girl Site - East Indian Hottie solo, group,
toys.. 


This email is an official complaint regarding the email address below
sending me unwanted spam.
 
The site www.saharaknitexxx.com is listed on it's whois as being hosted
by http://www.servermatrix.com On their site it states that all
complaints should be addressed to the email address who are receiving
this complaint.
 
I as the owner of the domain www.ravishingindians.com swear that I have
never opted in to receive any emails from this recently launched web
site, and would like you to take any actions necessary to stop this
happening again.
 
Awaiting your reply
 
Thanks and regards
 
Joe A
webmaster@ravishingindians.com 
 
I am also including below a comment from another webmaster to show his
reply to Sahara Knite after receiving 6 copies of similar spam:

----- Original Message -----
